item.title: Bundestagswahl 2017
item.description: This German election is the first time since World War II that a racist and history revisionist party is elected into the German Bundestag - our Congress. Looking at the predications from SÃ¼ddeutsche Zeitung just 2 pm on election day (UTC+1) the predictions show a 10+ % yield for the AfD, easily reaching the 5 % threshold for entry. (Source: www.sueddeutsche.de “Wahlzentrale” from 2017-09-24 14:00 UTC+1) 5.316.095 people made the AfD their first choice and 5.
